head.title: NOTRE DAME AND MIAMI VICTORIOUS IN BIG EAST MEET

hedline.hl1: NOTRE DAME AND MIAMI VICTORIOUS IN BIG EAST MEET

abstract.p: Notre Dame University wins men's title at Big East track and field championships (S)

block.p: Notre Dame's Luke Watson, a senior from Stillwater, Minn., won the 5,000-meter run yesterday in 14:14:14 after taking the 3,000-meter steeplechase Saturday, leading the Fighting Irish to the men's team triumph in the Big East championships at Storrs, Conn.
The high hurdler Selim Nurudeen (13.95) and the triple jumper Godwin Mbagwu (50) were other gold medalists for Notre Dame, which edged defending champion Connecticut, 139 points to 136.

Notre Dame's Luke Watson, a senior from Stillwater, Minn., won the 5,000-meter run yesterday in 14:14:14 after taking the 3,000-meter steeplechase Saturday, leading the Fighting Irish to the men's team triumph in the Big East championships at Storrs, Conn.
The high hurdler Selim Nurudeen (13.95) and the triple jumper Godwin Mbagwu (50) were other gold medalists for Notre Dame, which edged defending champion Connecticut, 139 points to 136.

Miami took the women's title for the third straight season, totaling 166 points, with Notre Dame (126) a distant second. The Hurricanes' Charlette Griggs doubled in the 200 (in a meet-record 23.18) and 400 (52.17.)
